languages.text: {n}Власть, вечность, понимание. К'тан уже принимал в услужение краткоживущие расы и сковал для них новую, величественную судьбу. Он извлек уроки из ошибок и готов вновь даровать лишь избранным.{/n}

{n}Power, eternity, comprehension. The C'tan once chose to reign over the short-lived races and forged a new and glorious fate for them. It has learned from Its mistakes. Now It will only bestow its gifts upon the chosen few.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Власть, вечность, понимание. К'тан уже принимал в услужение краткоживущие расы и сковал для них новую, величественную судьбу. Он извлек уроки из ошибок и готов вновь даровать лишь избранным.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Power, eternity, understanding. C'Tan had already employed the short-lived races and had created a new, glorious fate for them. He had learned from His mistakes and is now only willing to give His blessing to the select individuals.{/n}

{n}Power, eternity, understanding. C'Tan had already employed the short-lived races and had created a new, glorious fate for them. He had learned from His mistakes and is now only willing to give His blessing to the select individuals.{/n}

{n}Power, eternity, comprehension. The C'Tan already employed the short-lived races and forged a new and glorious fate for them. He has learned from His mistakes and is now only willing to give His blessing to the select individuals.{/n}

{n}Power, eternity, comprehension. The C'Tan already employed the short-lived races and forged a new and glorious fate for them. He has learned from His mistakes and is now only willing to give His blessing to the select individuals.{/n}

{n}Power, eternity, comprehension. The C'tan once chose to reign over the short-lived races and forged a new and glorious fate for them. It has learned from Its mistakes. Now It will only bestow its gifts upon the chosen few.{/n}

{n}Power, eternity, comprehension. The C'tan once chose to reign over the short-lived races and forged a new and glorious fate for them. It has learned from Its mistakes. Now It will only bestow its gifts upon the chosen few.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Le pouvoir, l'éternité, la compréhension. Jadis, le C'tan a choisi de régner sur les races éphémères, auxquelles il a offert un nouveau destin glorieux. Ayant appris de ses erreurs, il n'est plus disposé à accorder sa bénédiction qu'à une poignée d'élus.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Power, eternity, comprehension. The C'tan once chose to reign over the short-lived races and forged a new and glorious fate for them. It has learned from Its mistakes. Now It will only bestow its gifts upon the chosen few.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Le pouvoir, l'éternité, la compréhension. Jadis, le C'tan a choisi de régner sur les races éphémères, auxquelles il a offert un nouveau destin glorieux. Ayant appris de ses erreurs, il n'est plus disposé à accorder sa bénédiction qu'à une poignée d'élus.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Poder, eternidad, comprensión. El C'tan ya decidió gobernar sobre las razas efímeras y forjó un nuevo y glorioso destino para ellas. Ha aprendido de Sus errores y ahora solo está dispuesto a otorgar Su bendición a unos pocos elegidos.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Power, eternity, comprehension. The C'tan once chose to reign over the short-lived races and forged a new and glorious fate for them. It has learned from Its mistakes. Now It will only bestow its gifts upon the chosen few.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Poder, eternidad, comprensión. El C'Tan ya intentó cooperar con las razas efímeras y forjó un nuevo y glorioso destino para ellas. Ha aprendido de Sus errores y ahora solo está dispuesto a otorgar Su bendición a individuos selectos.{/n}

languages.text: {n}力量、永生、知识。星神曾一度统治着那些短命的种族，为他们创造了更加辉煌的命运，而祂已经从祂曾经的错误中吸取了教训。如此，祂只愿意把祂的礼物赐予那些被祂选中的极少数人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Power, eternity, comprehension. The C'tan once chose to reign over the short-lived races and forged a new and glorious fate for them. It has learned from Its mistakes. Now It will only bestow its gifts upon the chosen few.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}力量、永生、知识……星神选择了那些短命的种族，为他们创造了更加辉煌的命运。而祂已经从祂的错误中吸取了教训，如今，祂只愿意把祂的祝福赐给那些被祂选中的人。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Macht, Ewigkeit, Erkenntnis. Der C'tan hat schon einmal über die kurzlebigen Völker geherrscht und ein neues, ruhmreiches Schicksal für sie geschmiedet. Er hat aus Seinen Fehlern gelernt. Jetzt wird Er nur den wenigen Auserwählten Geschenke gewähren.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Power, eternity, comprehension. The C'tan once chose to reign over the short-lived races and forged a new and glorious fate for them. It has learned from Its mistakes. Now It will only bestow its gifts upon the chosen few.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Macht, Ewigkeit, Erkenntnis. Der C'tan hat die kurzlebigen Rassen bereits eingespannt und ein neues, glorreiches Schicksal für sie geschmiedet. Er hat aus seinen Fehlern gelernt und ist nun nur noch bereit, seinen Segen den ausgewählten Individuen zu gewähren.{/n}

languages.text: {n}力、永遠、理解。ク＝タンはかつて短命の種族の上に君臨することを選び、彼らに新たな栄光の運命を築いた。ク＝タンは己の過ちから学び、今では選ばれし者だけに祝福を与えようとしている。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Power, eternity, comprehension. The C'tan once chose to reign over the short-lived races and forged a new and glorious fate for them. It has learned from Its mistakes. Now It will only bestow its gifts upon the chosen few.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}力、永遠、理解。ク＝タンはかつて短命の種族の上に君臨することを選び、彼らに新たな栄光の運命を築いた。ク＝タンは己の過ちから学び、今では選ばれし者だけに祝福を与えようとしている。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Güç, ebediyet ve idrak. C'tan; kısa yaşamlı ırklara hükmetmeyi seçmişti, onlar için yeni ve şanlı bir kader yazmıştı. Artık hatalarından ders çıkardı, armağanlarını sadece seçilmiş birkaç kişiye bahşedecek.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Power, eternity, comprehension. The C'tan once chose to reign over the short-lived races and forged a new and glorious fate for them. It has learned from Its mistakes. Now It will only bestow its gifts upon the chosen few.{/n}
